Title: Dakini
Actors: Sarasa Balussery, Indrans, Chemban Vinod Jose, Saiju Kurup
Plot: Kuttan Pilla, Moly's long lost lover is kidnapped by the underworld king named Mayan. 4 grannies and Kuttappi with the help of Vikraman, a local gangster decide to go on a journey to fight the fierce don Mayan and bring back Kuttan Pilla.
